Issue.description: validator02: chmod: ==> validator02: cannot access '/etc/systemd/system/orientdb.service' ==> validator02: : No such file or directory ==> validator03: chmod: ==> validator03: cannot access '/etc/systemd/system/orientdb.service' ==> validator03: : No such file or directory ==> validator04: chmod: ==> validator04: cannot access '/etc/systemd/system/orientdb.service' ==> validator04: : No such file or directory Trivial defect we need to remove the chmod for orientdb.server from the script since orientdb is no more used There is also a minor typo in hosts file at: vagrant/training/vb-multi-vm/etc/hosts >
